relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus

Well our. College does not have closed gates around campus because we are located near apartments for the elderly, we have an amazing staff of police officers ion vampus, and police station located behind our campus. :)
As I explained earlier, we have MANY clubs and on campus activities to look at. (STEM,art,academic,theatre,science,drama,and much more)
Participate in anything you can. it feels great to be involved, and participating with our college and college activities.

The eagle located near the library is a very symbolic part of our campus. it is the biggest statue on campus, and for some reason grabs the attention of many without knowing. It is also our school mascot.
Normal community college which has lower cost on textbooks, and other materials needed. Great ban for the buck items :)

There are many clubs offered on campus that you may participate in.Also. Our campus has many activities in the quad when our college has an upcoming football game, college fairs, navy recruits, or holidays.
There are many restaurants near campus. Starbucks, Denny's, Mcdonalds,and many more are around campus.

This college offers a variety of well organized programs. Puente, for example, is a great program on campus that offers the knowledge of why it is important to transfer to a four year university, and to prepare you to become a successful individual, and student. The Honors program is an excellent program also offered on campus

I could honestly say that all students should be prepared for the courses. Each course is going to be time consuming,however, make time for your studies,and your loved ones. Not only do some courses have many assignments, but

Mount San Jacinto is a great college in our community. Located in a small town, San Jacinto,CA, it is a very great college for the community, and offers various programs, and studies. I honestly give this college an 8 out of 10.
pageTitle: Mt San Jacinto Community College District Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Great for these types of students This school is great for any type of student, but is best for students who do not have a lot of money and are looking for a top-notch education. Even top students in high school will learn as much at this school as if they went to a 4 year university. Tips for prospective students Buy the books from somewhere online or from other students. I paid for all my books new and they were all over $60. Bang for the buck The tuition is extremely cheap. I LOVE how cheap it is. Compared to other schools, going to Mount San Jacinto is like going to school for free, which in this economy is mind blowing! The cafe is also very cheap but it serves delicious food. Am enjoying being here The faculty is extremely nice and open with the student population and even the students are friendly and open-minded. I love being close to the mountain even though the weather can sometimes be hot, but the campus is small and it is very easy to locate classes. Am learning a lot Ever since I first
